document_data.mainbody:
Borlyth Bay was a small bay south of the Cloakwood on the Sword Coast North.
Borlyth Bay was named after the monster-infested village of Borlyth with had its sheltered anchorage and derelict shipyards on the bays shores. It was connected to the larger Cloak Bay with Fang forming its western edge. The hamlet of Ausabbason stood on Borlyth Bays northernmost end, to the south from the rocky plateau that formed the bays eastern border.
